CENG 340

Introduction to Environmental Engineering

Schedule

Fall 2013. Bucknell University
The list of topics and associated reading assignmemnts are subject to change. But homework due dates and exam dates are fixed. You are responsible for checking the calendar regularly for updates.

Note that TB stands for the main textbook.
